manger.descr.all: Send a message to all members
manger.msg.black.add: Added user "{0}" to the current group's blacklist
manger.msg.black.del: Removed user "{0}" from the current group's blacklist
manger.msg.blackg.add: Added user "{0}" to the global blacklist
manger.msg.blackg.del: Removed user "{0}" from the global blacklist
manger.msg.exit_group_add_black: Detected that user "{0}" has left the group and has been automatically added to the current group's blacklist
manger.msg.black_join_group.group: Detected that user "{0}" is on the current group's blacklist
manger.msg.black_join_group.global: Detected that user "{0}" is on the global blacklist
